channel.title: Error?

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

This code works.

You can’t do

n+1 := n;

You have to do

n := n + 1;

Working and formatted code:

program automultilog;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var
  n : Integer;

const
  logins = 4; //number of acounts to multilog in

procedure openie; // opens runescape in IE
begin
  typesend('int');
  wait(3000);
  MMouse(142,102,2,2);
  Mouse(142,102,2,2,true);
  Typesend('www.runescape.com');
  wait(3000);
end;

procedure newwindow;   // clickes new window in IE
begin
  n := 0;
  repeat
    n := n+1;
    wait(2000);
    MMouse(27,37,2,2);
    Mouse(27,37,2,2,true);
    wait(500);
    MMouse(28,52,2,2);
    Mouse(28,52,2,2,true);
    wait(500);
    MMouse(234, 54,2,2);
    Mouse(234, 54,2,2,true);
  until (n = logins-1)      //subtracts one to compensate for the base IE window
end;

begin
  setupSRL;
  ActivateClient;
  wait(2000);
  openie;
  newwindow;
end.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Error?
item.dc:creator: @redragonje65 redragonje65
item.description:
@redragonje65 wrote:

[scar]program automultilog;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var n : Integer;

const
logins = 4; //number of acounts to multilog in

procedure openie; // opens runescape in IE
begin
typesend(‘int’);
wait(3000);
MMouse(142,102,2,2);
Mouse(142,102,2,2,true);
Typesend(‘www.runescape.com’);
wait(3000)

end;
procedure newwindow; // clickes new window in IE
begin
n := 0;
repeat
n+1 : = n;
wait(2000);
MMouse(27,37,2,2);
Mouse(27,37,2,2,true);
wait(500);
MMouse(28,52,2,2);
Mouse(28,52,2,2,true);
wait(500);
MMouse(234, 54,2,2);
Mouse(234, 54,2,2,true);
until n = logins-1; //subtracts one to compensate for the base IE window

end;

begin
setupSRL;
ActivateClient;
wait(2000);
openie;
newwindow;

end.[/scar]

This is a script Im makeing that will open runescape in Internet Explorer multiple times and then log on to multiple runescape accounts at once.
I tryed to test what i had so far but I get an error.
Line 22: [Error] (15520:2): Assignment expected in script

Line 22 is

n+1 : = n;

please help me with my solve this problem.

Read full topic
